Hero.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.
Hero.goal: Our goal is to enhance learning
Hero.mainTitle: A site to create digital exams
Hero.description: You can now create, share, and take tests easily, with the ability to get instant results and evaluate your performance.

HowToStart.title: How to Get Started
HowToStart.step1Description: Easily create your test by adding appropriate questions, answers, and time limits.
HowToStart.step2Description: Share the test with others through a dedicated link or social media.
HowToStart.step3Description: Receive immediate results and analyze participant performance.

Contact.title: Get In Contact
Contact.description: Feel free to reach out to us, and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

Login.prompt: Hi! Are you ready to login? Just enter your {{type}} and password below, and you're good to go!

Register.welcome_message: Hi! We need some details from you to get started.
Register.name: Name
Register.check_email: Your account has been created. Please check your email to activate your account.
Register.enter_username_or_email: Please enter either a username or an email.
Register.account_created_no_email: Your account has been created successfully. You can now log in using your username and password.

ForgotPassword.email_instructions: We have sent you an email with instructions to reset your password. Please check your email.
ForgotPassword.title: Forgot Password

ActivateAccount.account_already_active: Your account is already active. You can now continue using your account.
ActivateAccount.redirect_to_login: You will be redirected to the login page shortly...
ActivateAccount.failure_description: An error occurred during the activation process. Please try again.

ResetPassword.success_description: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now log in using your new password.
ResetPassword.error_message: An error occurred while resetting the password

Error.description: Sorry, the page you're looking for doesn't exist.

Unauthorized.description: You do not have permission to view this page.

Library.addPublicQuizToLibrary: Failed to add public quiz to library
Library.addQuizToLibraryUsingToken: Failed to add quiz to library using token
Library.removeQuizFromLibrary: Failed to remove quiz from library
Library.shareQuizWithCandidate: Failed to share quiz with candidate

Question.fetchQuizFromLibrary: Failed to fetch quiz from the library

User.forgetPasswordFailed: Failed to send password reset link

AddLibrary.addingQuizToLibrary: Adding the quiz to your library...
AddLibrary.successPublicQuiz: The public quiz has been successfully added to your library
AddLibrary.successPrivateQuiz: The private quiz has been successfully added to your library
AddLibrary.errorAddingQuiz: An error occurred while adding the quiz to your library

Library.loadingError: An error occurred while loading the library.
Library.noQuizzes: There are currently no quizzes in your library.

Quiz.loadingError: An error occurred while loading the quizzes.
Quiz.title: User's Quizzes
Quiz.question: question

QuizQuestions.loadingError: An error occurred while loading the questions.
QuizQuestions.noQuestionsFound: No questions found for this quiz.
QuizQuestions.noOptionsAvailable: No options available for this question.

DeleteLibraryModal.confirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this quiz from your library?

QuizStartModal.confirmationMessage: Are you ready to start the quiz? Make sure to review all instructions before proceeding.

DeleteQuestionModal.confirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this question

EditQuestionsModal.loadingError: An error occurred while loading questions: {{error}}
EditQuestionsModal.noQuestionsFound: No questions found for this quiz

error.quizTimeRequired: Quiz time is required and must be a number greater than zero.
error.quizCreationFailed: Failed to create quiz. Please try again.

DeleteQuizModal.confirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this quiz
DeleteQuizModal.warningMessage: All grades related to this quiz will be deleted. This information cannot be restored after deletion

EditQuizModal.title: Edit Quiz Information
EditQuizModal.errorMessage: Error updating quiz. Please try again.
EditQuizModal.quizDescriptionPlaceholder: Enter a description for the quiz...
EditQuizModal.quizTimePlaceholder: Allowed time for the quiz (in minutes)
EditQuizModal.timeInputHint: Enter the total number of minutes students can complete the quiz

ShareLinkModal.title: Share Quiz Link
ShareLinkModal.description: Here is the shareable link for the quiz

DeleteScoreModal.confirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the test score?

DeleteAccountModal.title: Confirm Account Deletion
DeleteAccountModal.confirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
DeleteAccountModal.warningMessage: Warning: All data associated with this account, including tests and scores, will be permanently deleted. This information cannot be recovered after deletion.
